data.description: a bundle to install all Gtk+ 2.x modules.
data.communities:
gtk-perl-list mailing list on mail.gnome.org. CVS at
    http://jodrell.net/cvs/viewcvs.cgi/Bundle-Gnome2/
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A bundle for the Gtk2-Perl libraries would be very handy, since
    there are a lot of them and it's a pain to install each one
    manually.
